Test Name: Insulin-Like Growth Factor 1 (IGF-1) and Insulin-Like Growth Factor-Binding Protein 3 (IGFBP-3) Growth Panel, Serum
Purpose: To provide accurate and reliable measurements of IGF-1 and IGFBP-3 levels in serum for clinical assessment.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Centrifuge (â‰ˆ3500 RPM) and automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Roche Cobas e411 or Siemens IMMULITE 2000)
